activities: AppExtremes’ web-based service processes data and information, which may include personal data, at the direction of its customers. AppExtremes does not choose or determine the types of data that are submitted to AppExtremes’ service and it may be transferred to third parties as part of providing the service. As part of AppExtremes’ internal operations, AppExtremes collects and uses personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective partners for sales, billing, marketing, and business partner recruitment purposes. Additionally, as part of AppExtremes’ internal operations, AppExtremes transfers personal data of its employees to AppExtremes’ U.S. headquarters for processing and storage. AppExtremes collects, transfers, and uses employee data for purposes of employee benefits and human resource administration. Such benefits and services include evaluation of qualifications for employment, provision of employment, compensation and benefits, reporting, security management, administration of compensation, performance management and company network access, authentication and personalization.
